abstract: In their new operating systems, Windows 8 and Mountain Lion, Microsoft and Apple are heading up the effort to make computers more like mobile devices. Innovation in smartphones has left desktop and laptop computers looking a little dull in comparison. Read more »

headline.main: Bringing Some of That Smartphone Buzz to Computers
